page.title: 09JOHN'S SUNDAY, BLEASDALE
page.content: I get up about 7 o'clock on Sunday morning and have breakfast.I help dad milk the cow and then let the calf suck.Then I go and feed the calves with provin.I take the milk into mum,it is warm and creamy.Mum puts the milk through a sile which strains the dirt out of it.Then I go back to dad,I back the motor-bike out of the barn and dad loads it with a bale of straw.We go up to the cows and feed them and check if any are calving.We also give them treacle in a tub which is full of vitamins.At 10 o'clock we get ready to go to Chapel.I wear my very best shirt.When we come home we have dinner and my sister Claire feeds the cats.In the afternoon I go to Sunday School,my friend Philip sometimes comes with me.When we get home we do the cows and have supper,watch TV and go to bed.
